Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.network

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.network.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverBattlefield, ObserverWorkerView
public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverBattlefield, ObserverWorkerView
ClientHandler execute commands from socket and send response to client. Every Thread has his own ClientHandler, such as a Virtual Client

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClientHandler​(LobbyManager lobbyManager, ClientThread clientThread)
    Create ClientHandler

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cancelPingTimeoutTimer()
    Cancel current Timeout set by ping request
    void disconnectionShutDown()
    Notifies the handler that a client has disconnected from the game, the handler will take care of notifying the client and closing the connection
    void gameEnded()
    Notifies the handler that the game has ended successfully, Client it's out the lobby (the client will have to redo addPlayer)
    java.util.UUID getLobbyID()
    Get the id of the lobby where the handler was registered
    LobbyManager getLobbyManager()  
    java.lang.String getNickName()
    Get the nickName registered on the server, if it is not registered a message is returned
    boolean isLobbyStarted()
    Informs if the handler is in a match state (the lobby has been started)
    boolean isMustStopExecution()
    Informs the caller if the handler is forced by the server to block its status and all ongoing executions
    void playerDisconnected()
    Function invoked the first time a client disconnects Takes care of checking in what state the client was (in play or waiting for the lobby) and if he had already been blocked by disconnecting another player
    void playerIsEliminated()
    Notifies the handler that the player has been eliminated from the match but the match is still in progress
    void process​(java.lang.String message)
    Process command received from socket, only if the client is not blocked by the server
    If the player makes an illegal move, the game is ended, considering him as responsible
    (Do not send the ping / pong message)
    void response​(java.lang.String m)
    Send message to client, only if the client is not blocked by the server
    void responseQueue​(java.lang.String message)
    Add message to queue
    void sendMessageQueue()
    Send all message in queue, only if the client is not blocked by the server
    void setLobbyID​(java.util.UUID lobbyID)
    Set the id of the lobby where the handler was registered
    void setLobbyStart()
    Informs the handler that the lobby has been started
    void setMustStopExecution()
    Informs the handler if it is forced by the server to block its status and all ongoing executions
    void setTimer​(int pingDelay)
    Execute ping to the client (with a certain cadence: pingDelay), expecting a feedback from client before timeout, If the timer expires the client is considered disconnected
    void update​(boolean[][] workerView)
    Send worker view when observer notify change, only if the client is not blocked by the server
    void update​(CellInterface[][] cellInterfaces)
    Send Battlefield when observer notify change, only if the client is not blocked by the server

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler​(LobbyManager lobbyManager, ClientThread clientThread)
      Create ClientHandler
      Parameters:
      lobbyManager - manage lobbies
      clientThread - socket thread

  • Method Details

    • setTimer

      public void setTimer​(int pingDelay)
      Execute ping to the client (with a certain cadence: pingDelay), expecting a feedback from client before timeout, If the timer expires the client is considered disconnected
      Parameters:
      pingDelay - milliseconds after which to ping (clockPingTimer), if pingDelay less or equal 0 then is set to default value = 5000ms

    • cancelPingTimeoutTimer

      public void cancelPingTimeoutTimer()
      Cancel current Timeout set by ping request

    • playerDisconnected

      public void playerDisconnected()
      Function invoked the first time a client disconnects Takes care of checking in what state the client was (in play or waiting for the lobby) and if he had already been blocked by disconnecting another player

    • disconnectionShutDown

      public void disconnectionShutDown()
      Notifies the handler that a client has disconnected from the game, the handler will take care of notifying the client and closing the connection

    • playerIsEliminated

      public void playerIsEliminated()
      Notifies the handler that the player has been eliminated from the match but the match is still in progress

    • gameEnded

      public void gameEnded()
      Notifies the handler that the game has ended successfully, Client it's out the lobby (the client will have to redo addPlayer)

    • process

      public void process​(java.lang.String message)
      Process command received from socket, only if the client is not blocked by the server
      If the player makes an illegal move, the game is ended, considering him as responsible
      (Do not send the ping / pong message)
      Parameters:
      message - containing the command

    • response

      public void response​(java.lang.String m)
      Send message to client, only if the client is not blocked by the server
      Parameters:
      m - message

    • sendMessageQueue

      public void sendMessageQueue()
      Send all message in queue, only if the client is not blocked by the server

    • update

      public void update​(CellInterface[][] cellInterfaces)
      Send Battlefield when observer notify change, only if the client is not blocked by the server
      Specified by:
      update in interface ObserverBattlefield
      Parameters:
      cellInterfaces - matrix

    • update

      public void update​(boolean[][] workerView)
      Send worker view when observer notify change, only if the client is not blocked by the server
      Specified by:
      update in interface ObserverWorkerView
      Parameters:
      workerView - workerView

    • responseQueue

      public void responseQueue​(java.lang.String message)
      Add message to queue
      Parameters:
      message - to Client

      public LobbyManager getLobbyManager()

      Returns:
      LOBBY ID

      public void setLobbyID​(java.util.UUID lobbyID)
      Set the id of the lobby where the handler was registered
      Parameters:
      lobbyID - LOBBY ID

    • isMustStopExecution

      public boolean isMustStopExecution()
      Informs the caller if the handler is forced by the server to block its status and all ongoing executions
      Returns:
      true if the Handler is blocked

    • setMustStopExecution

      public void setMustStopExecution()
      Informs the handler if it is forced by the server to block its status and all ongoing executions

    • setLobbyStart

      public void setLobbyStart()
      Informs the handler that the lobby has been started

    • isLobbyStarted

      public boolean isLobbyStarted()
      Informs if the handler is in a match state (the lobby has been started)
      Returns:
      true if the lobby has been started

    • getNickName

      public java.lang.String getNickName()
      Get the nickName registered on the server, if it is not registered a message is returned
      Returns:
      nickName or Not_Registered message
